var phoneLocaleList=[{icon:"🇨🇳",value:"+86"},{icon:"🇰🇷",value:"+82"}];export var parseQuery=function parseQuery(queryString){var query={};var pairs=(queryString[0]==="?"?queryString.substr(1):queryString).split("&");for(var i=0;i<pairs.length;i++){var pair=pairs[i].split("=");query[decodeURIComponent(pair[0])]=decodeURIComponent(pair[1]||"");}return query;};export var isUserSignedIn=function isUserSignedIn(user){return
